# Do not modify this file!  It was generated by ‘bemmerator’
# and may be overwritten by future invocations.  Please make changes
# to support-scripts/src/bemmerator.hs or create a separate file to
# overwrite entries in this one instead.
bem_state_construction_sell_orders = {
	sg:construction = {
		value = state_goods_production
	}
}
bem_state_capex = {
	value = owner.investment_pool_income
	multiply = bem_state_investment_share
}
bem_cbp_b_lower = {
	value = bem_state_capex
	divide = 10
}
bem_cbp_lower_bound = {
	value = bem_state_construction_sell_orders
	divide = 3
}
bem_cbp_b_upper = {
	value = bem_state_capex
	divide = 190
}
bem_cbp_upper_bound = {
	value = bem_state_construction_sell_orders
	multiply = 3
}
bem_cbp_ndelta_a = {
	value = 145
}
bem_cbp_ndelta_b = {
	value = -100
	multiply = {
		value = 0.9
		multiply = bem_state_construction_sell_orders
		divide = 2
	}
	subtract = bem_state_capex
}
bem_cbp_ndelta = {
	value = 0
	subtract = bem_cbp_ndelta_b
	divide = bem_cbp_ndelta_a
}
bem_cbp_pdelta_a = {
	value = 100
	multiply = {
		value = 0.9
		divide = {
			value = 2
			multiply = bem_state_construction_sell_orders
		}
	}
}
bem_cbp_pdelta_b = {
	value = 55
}
bem_cbp_pdelta_c = {
	value = 0
	subtract = bem_state_capex
}
bem_cbp_pdelta = {
	value = 0
	subtract = bem_cbp_pdelta_b
	add = {
		value = bem_cbp_pdelta_b
		multiply = bem_cbp_pdelta_b
		subtract = {
			value = 4
			multiply = bem_cbp_pdelta_a
			multiply = bem_cbp_pdelta_c
		}
		pow = 0.5
	}
	divide = {
		value = 2
		multiply = bem_cbp_pdelta_a
	}
}
bem_construction_buy_package = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			bem_cbp_b_upper >= bem_cbp_upper_bound
		}
		value = bem_cbp_b_upper
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			bem_cbp_b_lower <= bem_cbp_lower_bound
		}
		value = bem_cbp_b_lower
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			bem_cbp_ndelta <= bem_state_construction_sell_orders
		}
		value = bem_cbp_ndelta
	}
	else = {
		value = bem_cbp_pdelta
	}
}
